sentence: U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday on expectations that Washington lawmakers would be able to settle their differences for an economic stimulus bill to pass before the Nov. 3 presidential elections.

.N

At 6:32 ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.52% at 28,245.
S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.77% at 3,449.25, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.80% at 11,743.5.
